arts.ttl: Fuming Schmid struggles to explain Werder's loss to Gladbach
arts.sum: Werder Bremen midfielder Romano Schmid was angry after an impressive 2-0 win over Bayer Leverkusen was followed by a 2-4 defeat to Gladbach.

arts.ttl: Alassane Pléa hat-trick propels Borussia Mönchengladbach to victory over Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Tim Kleindienst celebrates scoring Gladbach's fourth, which was teed-up by hat-trick hero Alassane Pléa. Alassane Pléa scored a sensational hat-trick as Borussia Mönchengladbach defeated Werder Bremen 4-2 to keep their hopes of qualifying for Europe alive and kicking.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Borussia Mönchengladbach preview: A midtable clash with European potential
arts.sum: A win from either side could see them firmly in the European picture.

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen’s Ole Werner feels conflicted over losses of Milos Veljkovic and Anthony Jung
arts.sum: SV Werder Bremen head-coach Ole Werner commented on Anthony Jung's forthcoming departure from the club at his Thursday press conference.
